entries.description: Minimum SAM CLI version is now 1.0.0
Debugging Python based Lambdas locally now have the Python interactive console enabled (Fixes #1165)
Add a setting for how the AWS profiles notification is shown (#2408)
Deleting resources now requires typing "delete me" instead of the resource name
Allow deploying SAM templates from the CloudFormaton node (#2166)
Improve error messages when properties are not found in templates (#2449)
Fix resource selectors assuming every region has every service (#2435)
Docker is now validated before building the Lambda when running and debugging locally (Fixes #2418)
Fixed several UI inconsistencies in the S3 bucket viewer actions
Fix showing stack status notification on opening existing CloudFormation stack (#2157)
Processes using the Step system (e.g. SAM build) can now be stopped (#2418)
Fixed the Remote Lambda Run Configuration failing to load the list of functions if not in active region
2020.1 support will be removed in the next release
